sentences: Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Ọkacha n'ihe onyonyo a na-emezi na Nollywood ugbua bụ na Bekee ka a na-eme ya.
Ọ bụ eziokwu na a ka na-eme n'asụsụ Igbo mana ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ ekwuola na ndị na-emepụta ihe onyonyo n'asụsụ igbo anaghị etinyezi uchu ịgba mbọ hụ na ha mere ya nke ọma.
N'ihe nkiri a, onye na-eme nkiri na Nollywood bụ Vicky Nwogu gwara BBC Igbo ihe ndị na-ewute ya gbasara ndị na-eji asụsụ Igbo eme nkiri na Nollywood.
